name: Test your Intelligence
description:
How smart are you? Test your intelligence by solving as many of these mind-boggling riddles as you can.

This is not an IQ test. You will be asked to solve some of the most amazing brain teasers taken from the biggest and best riddle site in Greece: grifoi.org. Solve as many as you can and get your intelligence rating at once!

How to play

Press the speech bubble to enter your answer to each riddle. All answers are numbers. When you answer incorrectly 5 times you will get evaluated based on your correct answers.
